data.system_settings: iPhone 6s with iOS 11.0.3 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.1 PB 5
data.actual_result: When switching to other channel, the unread message indicator next to the channel name still persists. Only way to fix is to scroll to the bottom in this chat.
data.expected_result: When opening the channel with the new messages, the channel should automatically be marked as read.
data.short_description: Channel won't get marked as read instantly when the new messages are just deleted messages
data.steps_to_repro: - With one account write at least 2 messages in any channel (make sure channel isn't muted for you) and delete all this sent messages - With other account go to this channel with the new messages that are just deleted messages - Switch to other channel in this server
